Reviews.Title: Nice but went out in 3 months
Reviews.Author: Joe in Los Angeles
Reviews.Content: I had been happy with the set.  The picture quality is very good but not the best I've seen.  I agree with other reviews it's a bit soft for my taste but it works well in the room it's in.  I'm not a gamer or a big sports fan so I haven't noticed any pixel lag.  It does a very good job with HD content.I wanted a monitor not an Internet appliance because I expected it to last many years.  It's hooked to an LG Blue Ray which is Internet capable and a TiVo.It was delivered in July and on Oct 2 it refuses to power up.  LG customer service was helpful on the phone but of course no service on the weekend as a matter of fact you can't even schedule service on the weekend.  And parts and labor warranty (2 years) does not include the $75 charge for "diagnosing the problem".I gave it 3 stars because a single failure on an electronic device is not a big deal.  I hope that after this repair it's reliable.  If not I'll report back.  I'm also curious how many other owners are experiencing issues like this.  I expect reliability from $1,000 products.Well 6 days later, it's fixed.  The local repair people (Videosonics Lab in Torrance - [...]) were great.  No charge, despite what the LG service people said.  They also said they have a lot of business repairing LG TVs,  they said Sony, Samsung and Sharp are much more reliable.My next TV probably won't be an LG.

Reviews.Title: Best deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Stephane Lemire "S.Lemire"
Reviews.Content: I bought this set 2 weeks ago. I choose it because it as a better image quality than Samsung, Sony and other Sharp models, with no reflection on the panel.For 700 $ this TV is a deal. Crisp images, deep blacks (dont pay for LED or 120htz those are nothing but gadgets) I watched the football game yesterday and it blows me away !!Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: LG all the way Great Products
Reviews.Author: Happy Consumer
Reviews.Content: The LG product has exceeded beyond my expectations It took months to research, It was LG or Samsung I have more knowledge about the LG they have good products and fair prices, I own two LG dvd players one which I've owned for 4 year, I recently bought the Blue ray dvd player I love it along with the LG 47450 LCD I would say to those that are not interested in having the latest model however the best price I would say buy this one. I'm sure the newer models may have all newer features but you will pay more when this flat screen shows a good clear picture sound, and easy to set up. I wanted to get the New LED LCD. Sure it maybe better but I was looking for the price and the quality as well. When the prices go down I will consider the newest later. Over all LG is great for the pice and quality, I also own a LG moblie phone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: helmfamily
Reviews.Content: We love this tv! I agree that 60hz does not matter. This has an incredible picture. The size is great too and for the price- you just can't beat it. This is our first lcd and it is awesome.  The delivery service was great. I tracked it with amazon online and then the company called me the morning of to give me a time to deliver. We are extremely satisfied. I highly recommend it if you are looking for a great tv for a really good price.

Reviews.Title: great deal!
Reviews.Author: T. Cochran
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research but in the end I'm very pleased with my purchase being a college student with not a whole lot of money this was a great bargain! The blacks could be a little darker and the image a little sharper but all in all i am very pleased, my parents have a 50" samsung plasma 720p and this has much better color accuracy, sharper image, easier to use and i payed $150 less for mine! And you cant even tell the difference in size they look identical in size. easy tv setup the menu is simple and makes navigating a breese. This tv looks great people will assume i payed double if triple the price. Im estatic! cant beat the price for just below $650! shipped to your door in less than 7 days!

Reviews.Title: Extremely good set for the dollar
Reviews.Author: Ronia1
Reviews.Content: Shopped every possible place known to man except WalMart since they could care less about the little guy. BestBuy, HH Gregg, Boscovs, Sears and others. This set was priced $100 less than the lowest I found anywhere. GREAT set with minimal fluff and easy controls. takes upa  good aprt of the main wall. easy remote. not too flashy, no muss no fuss.

Reviews.Title: Solid TV
Reviews.Author: btganey
Reviews.Content: For the price, it would be very hard to find a TV of superior quality to this 47" LG. From gaming to TV to movies, I have enjoyed the various display and audio settings. The TV does not possess the internet-driven frills of the newer lines of TVs, but if you are not seeking such functions this TV is surely the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Red sox RN
Reviews.Content: I found this TV on amazon $100.00 less than Walmart (right before Thanksgiving) and LOVE it! Picture quality (once we figured whichinput to select with our cable, which took a couple tries)is crystal.The screen size is perfect for our family room, no side distortion,two friendly men delivered it and took out of box for us to inspect that there was no damage. Set-up was easy...for $650 and free shipping, this WAS A STEAL! I have read a lot of reviews and based my decision on them, so far I am glad I got the LG.

Reviews.Title: new lcd
Reviews.Author: amazonite
Reviews.Content: purchased this for the den in our house. after reading reviews saw lg coming up on top many times. decided to go for it the price was right. it looks incredible in the den, love the picture. the controls are easy, which is always a plus. i purchased a 26' lg for my bedroom as well. quite pleased !

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Jeremy E.
Reviews.Content: So far I've had this TV a week and I'm very impressed with the picture quality. I still can't believe the quality of this TV for how low the price was. I was a little worried it wouldn't live up to my expectations not being LED and only 60hz but honestly the difference is not worth the money. I actually find the 120hz TVs to have an annoying home film look to them anyway when watching blu-rays. I have the new Apple TV connected to it along with my Xbox 360. I haven't noticed any ghosting yet like others have mentioned but I also haven't watched any blu-rays on it. High-def content on the Apple TV looks amazing. Also it's worth mentioning that the VGA port on this TV supports full 1080P resolution. This means you can hook up your old non-HDMI Xbox 360 and get full 1080P resolution using the xbox 360 VGA cable. If you want to play sound through the TV's speakers using the VGA input you will need an adapter though as there is only a 3.5mm sound input.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Rwrfoxy ""Carol""
Reviews.Content: I haven't had this TV very long but so far it is great. I had to replace my panasonic rear projection tv because the lamp keep going out every 4 to 6 months. I thought it was a great tv till I got this one. It was so easy to set up and being I had no help this was a big plus. It is light in weight which I could pick up and put the base on and sit it on the stand. Programming it was a breeze. The manual is on a disc which you have to download on your computer to read. Wasn't impressed with that. The picture is great and the remote has information on it for what is playing and what will play next, which the panasonic didn't have. This is a plus for me as do not have cable. Over all I love this tv and right now would recommend it. Hope it last longer than my panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Lawrence B. Elias
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price, alot of fine tuning features, great picture, nice glossy black finish, the fact that this TV is only 60hz doesn't bother me, I can't tell the difference anyhow. Definetly worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Kinga
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure about Lg as a TV brand, but when it was delivered it was love at first sight. I only paid $650 for a 47in which i think is insane. can't find a better deal then this.

Reviews.Title: LG 47 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: satisfied buyer
Reviews.Content: This TV has the most beautiful picture!!  I bought an extra cable (HDMI) for $30 and the picture is amazing!!  I ordered this TV on Monday and Thursday at 9AM it was delivered.  Amazing price at $749.99!!  I am VERY satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Soft image, pixel lag
Reviews.Author: xeno
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV as an upgrade for a 3 year old 42" LG LCD.  It looked good in the store, however, when I got it home the picture looked quite soft.  I fiddled around with the settings for quite awhile but couldn't get the clarity that my current TV has.  I also noticed that there was quite a bit of pixel lag, especially when gaming.  Quite disappointing, but not unexpected at this price range, but I was hoping for some improvement of technologies over the last few years.  In any case, this may be a good TV for those who don't mind the soft image, but it didn't meet my quality standards.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: I know this is late.  We've had this TV around 4 years now, I think.  We got exactly what was described.  Still using it today.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: I purchased this gift for my mother as a christmas gift and she loved it.  I would recommend this brand.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: boysmom
Reviews.Content: We have had no problems at all.  It works well and is very enjoyable to watch.  So glad we got it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price till it Just Dies one Day
Reviews.Author: Jack Miller
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv about a year and a half ago. No real issues with it.  It was a great TV for the price but it only lasted for a year and a half before it stopped working.  Not exactly a cheap TV either so now I either have to replace it or I have to pay to have it fixed or replace it.  After some research it looks like faulty resistors.  Simply bad parts put in by LG, its a common issue with these TVs.  Be cautious and get the extended warranties if you are going to purchase one of these sets.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Cathie H
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a gift for my father and he loves the TV.  He mentions all the time how nice the TV is and we felt that it was a great value.  Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: 47" 1080p LCD from LG
Reviews.Author: Louis
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this TV. Nice pictures and easy to use. I like it more than the Sony. This TV was on sale and is cheaper than other stores.

Reviews.Title: Expensive Junk
Reviews.Author: K. Benoit "K B"
Reviews.Content: Don't buy a TV any more buy the warranty. This product had a one year warranty. I bought it in March of 2010. On August 2012 it is dead. They want $200 to diagnose the problem and there is no guarantee it can be fixed or what parts will cost. For a $1000 TV to last 28 months comes out to roughly $450 a year for a TV. The cost of ownership is to high for me. I will never buy another product with the LG brand on it.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Alejandr0
Reviews.Content: I receive nothing but compliments on the picture quality of this TV.  I don't miss it being 60Hz as opposed to 120Hz, but I'd definitely miss it not being 1080.  I watch BluRay DVDs and also use OTA reception for all of my broadcasts.  Without the 1080p, I'd definitely be missing out.  If you are installing an Over The Air (OTA) system for your TV, don't get anything less than 1080p.The TV loses one star for not having a defined button on the remote for closed captions.  I have to press no less than four buttons to turn the captions on an off.  That's a real pain when you are switching from shows to sports.  The TV also doesn't have a very good Guide function.  It only pulls down the info for the current and next show of the channel you are actively watching.  You have to cycle to each channel, wait for the info to come down, and then press the info button in order to see what is coming up next on that channel.

Reviews.Title: Totally in love!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Grodem
Reviews.Content: This tv is great, especiall for the price. The picture was clear, the tv is just as it looks, if not better, and the delivery was prompt. The delivery guy carried it in and had me look it over before he left. I love my tv.

Reviews.Title: LG 47LD450
Reviews.Author: DRA
Reviews.Content: Purchased from Conn's as a floor model about 1 & 1/2 years ago. Sold on the picture quality as viewed side-by-side with a Samsung LCD that sold for ~ $1,000 more. Have experienced some pixel lag periodically, but attribute that to AT&T; U-Verse problems -- not the TV. After the last AT&T; service call, no pixel lags at all. Spent quite a bit of time "playing" with the picture and sound adjustments to get the picture and sound that best suits the home environment. Well worth the effort. After experimentation, the picture and sound is much better than the default settings. Although I'm typically electronically challenged in many respects, the adjustments were manageable. Just takes some patience and experimentation with the different settings. Overall, well pleased with this TV. :) The HD quality is stunning. Lately, even noticed a signficant improvement in SD viewing. Suspect that was also an AT&T; issue. Not pleased at all with U-Verse. :( Mention because it would have been easy to blame the TV many times, when it was really the provider's equipment causing problems.

Reviews.Title: LG 47LD450 47-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: C.A. Nahm
Reviews.Content: I shopped around and found  this TV to be relatively inexpensive. The original was defective when received, usable, but being concerned that it would die because of the defect, LG  replaced it with a new one, which is fine. LG took care of the set up and the return.

Reviews.Title: My TV is awesome
Reviews.Author: Sampzie2173
Reviews.Content: The picture and size are amazing. I bought this TV at a local walmart about four months ago annoy still runs great. I get compliments on this TV all the time and movies and video games are always played at my house :)Blu rays look amazing! Rich colors and an overall great product. My only complaint is that the glossy black finish I have collects and shows dust like nobodies business. As for any audio problems... Join the 21st century and buy a sound system for fifty bucks... What's the point of a HD picture without an HD sound.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: debraye "debraye"
Reviews.Content: Got this TV just before March Madness along with HD TV.  Crystal Clear reception.  We could see every blade of grass watching the Masters this weekend.  LOVE THIS TV!!!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Be Happier
Reviews.Author: K.S. Benedicite
Reviews.Content: If there were a single problem with this LG television, it would be that I could watch it all day and never get anything done!  Just to enjoy the amazing picture quality!  We are all saying that it is better than a movie screen, by far.Set up was simple; we did go in and adjust colors and tones a little . . . we always do that . . . but it was lovely "out of the box."  There are quite a few features we particularly like, including the way when you fast forward through commercials on a recorded program and then hit "play," the playback adjusts and starts just where it should . . . you miss nothing of your program.Such a good price!  My goodness!  We couldn't be happier with this item!

Reviews.Title: excellent TV
Reviews.Author: RMR Jr "Robert"
Reviews.Content: This TV was a snap to set up and with my Dish it automatically set up the remote without me calling Dish..Very intuitive TVAlso, picture is outstanding !!Great value especially through Amazon!

Reviews.Title: LG 47ld450 + Amazon= The Best
Reviews.Author: RJMT
Reviews.Content: Had the TV for about 2 weeks now.  It's great.  Quality sound, sharp picture, good features.  Took out the 4 year extended warranty just in case.  Not only did Amazon offer one of the lowest prices around but their other purchase perks (free 30 day return shipping+price match guarantee) are things that no other retailer has yet to offer.  So far, this TV and perks can't be beat.  Top notch.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for the buck in LCD's
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: I chose this TV after reading consumer reports review (they recommend it) and finding it on Amazon for such a great price. Consumer Reports review is spot on. The sound is great for the built-in speakers, the picture is really great. You can't go wrong for the price and I would easily pay another $200 - 300 for this TV. The menu is really easy to navigate and their picture wizard makes it a cinch to setup the screen yourself. No need to pay more.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: jlcarfan
Reviews.Content: I have had The LG for 3 weeks now and so far I love it. Everyone that I have demoed a bluray for, has been blown away. For the Price I think it was a fantastic deal. It has great features. though only 2 HDMI inputs.I know that alot of times critics give mid range LCD's a hard time about not having deep enough blacks. Coming from a 720p plasma, this TV is a revelation. the blacks are astonishing and the colors are bright and vivid. I think I can see alittle blur during heavy action sense,  do to the tv just having 60hz and not 120hz capabilty. but bottom line best $617 I have ever spent.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Teresa Firmin "tee"
Reviews.Content: great tv.  great lg product. best color, has multiple features,great sound,and HD.  My daughter lives in my bedroom just to watch this television.  color is crisp and clear and Lg makes great tv's.

Reviews.Title: Simply wonderful!
Reviews.Author: TechyNerd
Reviews.Content: We have a Vizio 37" and now this LG 47", really, most of us will not be able to discern the mynute differences between the various makes and models.  Here's another tip, if you want internet access, some very highly rated consumer blu-ray players can be had for under $100, so don't waste the money on these features on the television.  These days, the TV is simply a monitor (just like a computer) to display the content from your other sources - like DVD, Cable\Dish, gaming, etc.This LCD is fantastic and now that it is selling for around $600, you simply can't go wrong with this purchase.  We own an LG front load washer and dryer and are sold on the LG brand.  P.S.  Buy your HDMI and other cables from Cables for Less dot com.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but missing "Stand Body"
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is great. A tremendous deal at the time. The image is quite good for a conventional LCD. Conventional LCDs are supposed to have poor black levels, but unless you put this thing next to a plasma, I don't think you'll be disappointed. Perfect if you just want a pretty large LCD HDTV without gimmicky things like 120Hz/240Hz, wireless internet, YouTube, Netflix, etc... I wanted an LED-backlit TV, but the premium is too high right now. My LG blu-ray player remote works the most important controls of the TV.LG forgot to pack the "Stand Body", the piece that connects the stand base to the TV. I called LG Customer Service and they had the part to me in exactly 1 week from the day I called. But I had to deduct a star for messing up such a simple thing.This TV does not send audio back through the HDMI cable, so you need a digital optical cable if you want to play the sound from the TV on a nice stereo system. I didn't deduct a star because most people who care about sound from the TV already have a digital optical cable (except me!). But they are dirt cheap (<3 shipped) on Amazon, so it's not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: Big Picture
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice TV but the only downfall is the volume. I have been told that all flat screens are the same way with the volume being low but other than that it is good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV so far, not good delivery
Reviews.Author: JDB26
Reviews.Content: I really like this so unit so far. Great picture quality and really big! I believe these 2 qualities are the bottom line for a TV. Happy to invest in these instead of bells and whistles that you never use or notice. The units speakers are pretty good too!My problem is with Amazon's delivery system.  I am traditionally a big Amazon fan but, it took a long time to get here, the expected delivery date turned out to be the date the local delivery company received it from Amazon.  I had to call to complain that it wasn't coming, no information was available.  Later I discovered an email from the local delivery company in my junk email box, it would not have gotten here sooner but Amazon needs to work on its process for delivering these type of products.  Perhaps the email should have come from Amazon instead or Amazon should have told me to expect an email from the company. Hope they learn to do this better.

Reviews.Title: Unpleasant experience
Reviews.Author: helen111
Reviews.Content: I chose this TV because it was recommended by Consumer Reports along with Samsung. Samsung was rated as excellent and LG - as very good. LG was $300 cheaper, so I bought LG. Unfortunately, my TV turned out to be defective. The picture was blurred and pixels were visible, especially on channel 7-1(ABC). I tried to watch V premiere on January 3rd, and it was horrible! It seemed like I was watching a defective DVD, except that it was a cable HD program. I checked my other TVs (Insignia and Dynex), but their picture was fine. LG tech support was no help - they blamed it on my cable provider, saying that there is something wrong with the signal. I tried switching my TVs putting them in different rooms but the result was the same: LG picture was blurred. I even called my friends who also have Cablevision as a cable provider, but the picture on their TVs was fine. When I asked the LG customer service representative if I should return the TV, she was quiet for 10 seconds and then asked: "Is there anything else I can help you with?" I guess I just wasn't lucky with this TV. Sound was mediocre too, BTW. I don't know how can anyone rate this TV sound more than 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: LG Means Large Garbage
Reviews.Author: HB
Reviews.Content: After only 4 months set stopped working. That's when I found out what lg means. They have deadlines for their service centers to order parts. If they miss the deadline, they have to wait 2 days to order parts. The service guy said "if your set broke two days ago I would already have ordered the part, now I have to wait two days". I went up the customer service joke ladder to Adrian in executive services and she said I could talk to no one above her. Like she owns lg or something and reports to no one else. My set broke Monday, today is Friday and I still have no idea when they will order the part or have the set repaired. I live in Chicago, not some place in the sticks. In my opinion, they should have replaced the set with a new one seeing it was only 4 months old. Do yourselves a favor, steer clear of lg. Inferior products with little or nonexistent support.This review will be written in any and all web sites I can possibly find, so in keeping with lg's terms in granting right to edit and delete my review. Knock your socks off.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture but FAIL
Reviews.Author: Kerry Edwards "Kerry"
Reviews.Content: Ordered from Amazing Deals Online. Received LCD tv in 1 week. (gave away old tv). Now almost exactly 22 hours later after using this TV the screen started to flicker and pop, then a loud hissing from the back and the screen FAILED.  Now, no TV just audio, and I have heard that LG has a 5% failure rate. That is 1 tv out of every 20 will FAIL within 1 year.  1 out of every 20 people will have a broken TV, without question. My CRT lasted 8 years and looked pretty damn good.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full HD 1080p Resolution
100,000:1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio
Picture Wizard II
Smart Energy Savings
ISFccc Ready
ProductInfo.Name: LG 47LD450 47-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV
